Context:
The text provides information about George Brown College's fast-track and bridging programs for students with existing post-secondary credentials. There are two types of programs mentioned: Advanced Standing bridging programs and Bridging programs.

Advanced Standing bridging programs allow students to apply their previous diploma in a related discipline towards completion of an Honours Bachelor degree program in a similar field of study.

Bridging programs are partnerships within a college or between two post-secondary institutions that enable students to apply previous credits towards the completion of a degree program in a similar field of study.

Contact information for George Brown College is provided: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The text also encourages visitors to sign up for college news and updates and provides links to social media hubs.

The information in the website is subject to change without notice. Students are advised to verify George Brown College fee requirements.
